description.zh: PLANKA 是一个以趣味驱动的项目管理工具，基于看板（Kanban）模式构建。它提供了一个协作性强、实时更新的任务与项目管理环境。设计灵活，支持丰富的 Markdown 格式、可定制的通知系统以及无缝的身份验证。
description.en: PLANKA is a fun-driven project management tool built around Kanban boards. It offers a collaborative, real-time environment for task and project management. Designed for flexibility, it supports rich markdown, customizable notifications, and seamless authentication.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 将直观的界面与实时协作相结合
- 高度可定制，支持100多个通知渠道
- 提供开源和企业级许可选项

## 功能列表:

- 支持拖放操作的协作式看板
- 所有用户实时同步更新
- 支持丰富格式的 Markdown 卡片描述
- 灵活的通知系统，支持多种渠道
- 通过 OpenID Connect 实现无缝身份验证
- 多语言界面，全面支持国际化
- 支持多种部署方式，可自托管
- 可扩展架构，支持自定义功能
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Combines intuitive interface with real-time collaboration
- Highly customizable with support for 100+ notification providers
- Offers both open-source and enterprise-grade licensing options

## Features:

- Collaborative Kanban Boards with drag-and-drop interface
- Real-time updates across all users
- Rich markdown support for card descriptions
- Flexible notifications through numerous providers
- Seamless authentication via OpenID Connect
- Multilingual interface with full internationalization support
- Self-hostable with multiple deployment options
- Extensible architecture for custom functionality
